node.text:
What do you do when you have 30 minutes to kill? Go play around on the river and take yoga pics with @jhill_flows!!! .
.
.
One legged crow requires so much core strength. If you have a strong crow pose, you can begin to work towards one legged crow. To lift your left leg, slowly shift your weight to your right side and press your right knee into your right tricep. Engage your core and slowly begin to raise your left leg towards the sky. You can keep your leg bent while first lifting the knee and then straighten your leg as you feel comfortable. If you have been wanting to add arm balances into your practice send me a message and we can talk about how to make that possible! 😀 I offer private lessons in person and online! ✌️❤️🕉️
.
.
.  #yoga #yogagirl #yogaclass #yogi #coloradoyogi #coloradoyoga #denveryogi #denveryoga #strength #armbalance #armbalances #oneleggedcrow #crowpose #ekapadabakasana #bakasana #asana #highvibesyoga #loveyourasana #fitchick #fitwithfibro #yogateacher #yogisofinstagram #yogagram #instayoga #instayogi #yogapose #yogapractice #practice #practiceandalliscoming

node.accessibility_caption: Image may contain: one or more people, shoes and outdoor

node.text:
Relax the Body. "In the beginning, relax the body. Inhale, and with the exhalation release tension. Inhale, and with the following exhalation, scan the body from top to bottom and from bottom upwards. Wherever there is gripping or tension - relax. The mind is looking at the body with a parental eye. With time, one can observe tense areas releasing and expanding into space. If areas of weakness are noticed, inhale into them with courage and enliven them with energy. Let excess leave the body; relax. Thus the body becomes stable and quiet." Orit Sen-Gupta from the Vijnana Yoga Practice Manual. *
*
*
#armbalancemonday #vijnana #yoga #bakasana #sirsasana #dynamicstretching #fascia #fascialfitness #FORMmethod #prehabilitation #injuryprevention #peakperformance #anatomytrains #tensegrity #tensegrityrepairseries #pranatricks #music

node.text: Playing around after day 5 with @adrienelouise 🕉💞

For fun...how many one legged crows can you do in a row? 😅🤘🏼🎉#ekapadabakasana I’m pretty sure this 8 was the most I’ve done. Almost lost it. Don’t forget to breathe!😉
Hints: the closer your knees are to your armpits, the harder this is. Move it down to make it more accessible. If your bakasana is solid, but you can’t lift up and back yet, alternate dropping a knee to the center, reset, try again. .
.
.
.
.
#bonnieyoga #mindfulmovement #mindfullife #bakasana #yogaplaytime #yogastrong #yogainspiration #yogaeverydamnday #sundayfunday #nipsout #pdxyoga #yogainpdx

Tagged by my beautiful and inspiring friend @yogini_444 to work on one minute #crow holds. I honestly never practice these and it shows. I was only able to get to 45 seconds and I was shaking like a leaf in a storm! My kids’ conversation during this was....
.
“Dude! Watch mom. She’s shaking so bad.”
.
“Yea, it’s because she’s old.”
.
#WTF 😳
.
Tagging @buffmama2011 @amsleah @awwjoaww to play, if you have time.

Bakasana o Crow pose

Justifica tus limitaciones y ciertamente las tendrás. 
#yoga #practiceyoga #bakasana #yoguini #selfknowledge #yogabsas  #yogaarg

node.text:
Slowly getting my crow back. 
#noinjuriesin2019please #bakasana #crowpose #backtobasics

Week 1️⃣
#ArmBalanceBootcamp2019
Crow/Crane to Eight Angle
#bakasana/#kakasana to #astavakrasana
.
🕉
	My thoughts 💭
💥💥💥 IMPORTANT 💥💥💥
If you have a goal to do deepen your arm balances in 2019 ,  this is the guy to learn from.  Joshua’s Lolasana Challenge was so well hosted and was more of a Workshop than a challenge.  He does live chats .  Long IGTV tutorials ,  detailed posts on challenge days ,  and most importantly he really gives a shit about what he is doing.  He wants you to succeed.  So jump into this challenge,  I promise you won’t be disappointed 👊🙏.
.
🕉
Where’s my #LolaCrew?! Aaaaand any one else that wants to jump in on this ... Here’s week 1 of Arm Balance Bootcamp 2019, with a simple transition that brings you from a higher perch to a lower pose. You’re moving with gravity, so the difficult level of this transition is fairly low. You can step up the challenging by keeping your arms straight. You can step up the challenge further by floating back to Crow from Eight Angle, as shown at the end of the first video; or step it up even further by moving from Flying Crow to Eight Angle, as demonstrated in the second.
.
Check out my IGTV video of this week’s transition. It’s short and sweet. I don’t go into crazy detail on the postures or transitions, but I do try to hit a couple points that may be useful to you in trying this.
.
You’ve got a week before the next one goes up. Have fun with this! If you fail, try again. And if you keep crashing, love on yourself for trying.
Success is in the attempt.
.
If you haven’t already, sign up to be notified when membership to CORE goes on sale via the link in my bio. The foundational strength you’ll gain in the program will make learning these transition far easier.
.
Get moving.
Keep moving.
#strvtmvmt
.
#yogadaily  #practiceandalliscoming #onebreathatatime  #yogaafter50 #yogaover50 #50andfit
#yogachallenge #yogastrong #compression #yoga #corework #core #bandhas #strongcore #yoga #igyoga #igyogacommunity #mobility #fitness #strengthbuilding

node.text:
“It’s easy to mistake the posture for the practice. Asana is the setting of the yoga practice, not the final goal of the discipline. Asana is a beautiful, powerful and poignant vehicle for self-study, the cultivation of focus and the development of equanimity.” Ohhh @jason_crandell this is so spot on. I love it! Please excuse me while I read this out in class this week 👌 
Not only do I🔝🔝🔝 agree with this you guys but ... you should also check out the @yogalandpodcast that @andreaferretti creates featuring not only Jason but other awesome yoga goodness each week. 
Today’s 📸 is a lil Sunday Side #crow taken @depotmanchester 🧗‍♀️ #breathe #balance #move #itsallyoga #yogasana #sidecrow #parsvabakasana #bakasana #twist #handbalance #armbalance #moveyourbody #yogateacher #yogi #londonyoga #liveinthepresent #bighair #cantseewhereimgoinganyway #now #yogapractice #yogisofinstagram #igyoga

Io sono pronta per riprendere e tu?

Image may contain: one or more people, people sitting, shoes, living room and indoor

node.text:
Crow, or Bakasana, is one of the first hand balancing postures I practiced when I started yoga. When I was younger, it came easily. I had a strong core (can we say 6 pack - say whaaaaaat 😳). However, that changed after I got pregnant and had my son 👶
.
I ended up having an emergency C-Section and recovery has taken me, quite literally, years. My muscles were totally shot and it took me a year before I even felt comfortable doing consecutive crunches. Now, I feel much stronger and as I was scrolling through photos I found my crow (or baby crow some would say) from a year ago, and my crow pose from last month. My son is 5 - and that’s how long it has taken me. Some recoveries don’t take that long, but keep in mind with resolutions sometimes it doesn’t take a week, month, or even year. This is a continual practice and a huge shoutout to those who have undergone surgery, injury, childbirth, or weight fluctuations. I see you, I hear you, and we are on this journey together ✌🏻
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
. .
#yogapracticedaily #yogicommunity #yogabody #yogisofig #vegan #veganfit #yoga #yogacommunity #yogaeverywhere #yogaeverydamnday #yogalife #yogalifestyle #yogatransformation #bakasana #crowpose #yogabody #veganathlete #vegantransformation #yogafam #yogamom #yogaathome #homepracticeyoga #homepractice
